GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Request
APP_DATE.instruction:
Enter the date you are submitting this request in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '25-12-2023'

CUST_ID.title: Customer ID
CUST_ID.instruction:
Enter your unique Customer ID.
Example: '10001234'

ACCOUNT_NO.title: Account Number
ACCOUNT_NO.instruction:
Enter the specific Account Number for which you need the statement.
Example: '100050009000'

CUST_NAME.title: Customer Name
CUST_NAME.instruction:
Write your full name as it appears in bank records.
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR'

REQ_TYPE_ADHOC.title: Request Type: Adhoc (Date Range)
REQ_TYPE_ADHOC.instruction: Tick this box if you want a statement for a specific custom date range (e.g., last 6 months).

ADHOC_FROM_DATE.title: Adhoc: From Date
ADHOC_FROM_DATE.instruction:
If 'Adhoc' is selected, enter the Start Date.
Example: '01-04-2023'
rejections: Adhoc selected but From Date missing

ADHOC_TO_DATE.title: Adhoc: To Date
ADHOC_TO_DATE.instruction:
If 'Adhoc' is selected, enter the End Date.
Example: '31-03-2024'
rejections: Adhoc selected but To Date missing
To Date is earlier than From Date

REQ_TYPE_MONTHLY.title: Request Type: Monthly
REQ_TYPE_MONTHLY.instruction: Tick this box if you want a statement for the *current* month only.

DELIVERY_EMAIL.title: Delivery: Email
DELIVERY_EMAIL.instruction: Tick this to receive the statement on your registered Email ID.

DELIVERY_POST.title: Delivery: Communication Address
DELIVERY_POST.instruction: Tick this to receive a physical copy by post at your registered address.

DELIVERY_BRANCH_SELF.title: Delivery: Print at Branch (Self)
DELIVERY_BRANCH_SELF.instruction: Tick this if YOU are at the branch and want to collect the printout yourself.

DELIVERY_BRANCH_BEARER.title: Delivery: Bearer
DELIVERY_BRANCH_BEARER.instruction: Tick this if you are sending SOMEONE ELSE (a Bearer) to collect the statement for you.

BEARER_NAME.title: Bearer Name
BEARER_NAME.instruction:
If 'Bearer' is selected, write the full name of the person collecting the statement.
Example: 'AMIT SINGH'

BEARER_SIGN.title: Bearer Signature
BEARER_SIGN.instruction: The Bearer must sign here to confirm receipt.

SIGNATURE_1.title: 1st Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_1.instruction: The primary account holder must sign here. This authorizes the request.

SIGNATURE_2.title: 2nd Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_2.instruction: If the account is joint, the second holder must sign here.

SIGNATURE_3.title: 3rd Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_3.instruction: If there is a third holder, they must sign here.

BANK_USE.title: Bank Use Section
BANK_USE.instruction: Service request number, employee ID, branch details, and official signature are to be completed by bank staff only.
